    jade

    jade安装使用

    By Luna's Jekyll Site December 16, 2013 Permalink

    jade安装使用

    jade是什么

    jade is node template engine

    接下来是一个例子：

    jade 代码

    doctype 5
html(lang="en")
  head
    title= pageTitle
    script(type='text/javascript').
      if (foo) {
         bar(1 + 5)
      }
  body
    h1 Jade - node template engine
    #container.col
      if youAreUsingJade
        p You are amazing
      else
        p Get on it!
      p.
        Jade is a terse and simple
        templating language with a
        strong focus on performance
        and powerful features.

    编译后的

    <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <title>Jade</title>
    <script type="text/javascript">
      if (foo) {
         bar(1 + 5)
      }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>
    <h1>Jade - node template engine</h1>
    <div id="container" class="col">
      <p>You are amazing</p>
      <p>
        Jade is a terse and simple
        templating language with a
        strong focus on performance
        and powerful features.
      </p>
    </div>
  </body>
</html>

    安装

    $ npm install jade -g

    运行

    $ jade -w index.jade
